name: Owlsome Christmas
description:
This year, Hooty was a little late for the Christmas preparation, so now he has to decorate all trees around his house alone.

He is very tired from the journey, so he only can move small ornaments. When he recovers a little (you'll see when it happens) he'll have the energy to move big presents and fly. 

Help him to decorate all trees and get well-deserved rest!

Controls:

WASD/Arrows - Move

When Hooty has Energy:
Q - Fly
E - Push Presents

Music generated by Mubert https://mubert.com/render
Sounds recorded by me

Hooty and items drawn as well as possible with my skill by me
Background/obstacles by https://rowdy41.itch.io/small-forest
UI by https://soulofkiran.itch.io/pixel-art-wooden-gui

Code by me in Unity
